course_description: Provides a foundation for professional development that continues throughout your MBA education, and beyond. Cornerstone has three main focus areas: Leadership and Teamwork, Presentation Skills, and Professional Development. Each area is essential to the overall development and success of the MBA student and professional. Focusing on Leadership and Teamwork, Presentation Skill, Professional Development Series.
